codeReview.summary: Implementation satisfies the feature and VAL-BUG-002: commander was moved from dependencies to peerDependencies with >=14.0.0 in packages/cli/package.json, a changeset was added, and the handoff includes successful bun install/test/typecheck verification. No blocking code issues found.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The library-worker skill is too rigid for manifest-only changes and conflicts with mission guidance for this repo: it mandates Red-phase test creation and bun run check, but this feature was package.json-only and mission AGENTS documents bun run check as a known panic.

summary: Pass: feature requirements were implemented correctly without blocking defects; one skill/procedure documentation gap was identified.
